actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to establish an interest penalty for failure to make prompt payments under service contracts with small business concerns.

summary.text: Provides that in the case of a failure to make a payment under a Federal service contract with a small business concern by the payment due date, the interest penalty shall be paid without regard to whether such concern is obligated to provide property or service after the required payment date.

titles.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to establish an interest penalty for failure to make prompt payments under service contracts with small business concerns.
